name: Us Drone Mission
description:
Us Drone Mission is the most epic military warfare game that offers an addictive mixture of strategy, fast-paced combat and real action! Operate the world’s best UCAVs with an arsenal of weapons and bring the rain!

Features:
- Realistic drone Simulation
- Brilliant graphics and environment
- Gamers favorite view
- Amazing sound effects
- Addictive sound track
- User friendly GUI and controls
